title: Drawing, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Dining Room Elevations and Plans", ca. 1936
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: DINING ROOM/SCALE 1/2"=1'; center right: SERVER; center: CONSOLE; center left: BUFFET
description: Plan and elevations for dining room of Block apartment. Large curtained window at center of north wall; server at center of east wall, between two doors; console at center of south wall, between two wide doors, buffet and other furniture on west wall.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Dining Room Elevations and Plans", ca. 1936.
ca. 1936. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-560.
